testcase.title: check filters for literature result page

steps.title: I perform Quick Search by "pain"

substeps.message: User is navigated to Literature report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Literature" on page 'Results'
I apply filter "Journal" from "Publication Type" filter set under "Literature" dataset
the results table header should contain the filter applied "Journal"

substeps.message: Filter Counts and Results Count are Matching

steps.title: I verify if filter count is matching the results count

substeps.message: [Header of results] Displayed applied filters: null

steps.title: there should not be applied filters after the user clicks link 'Clear' in filters group "Publication Type"
the user clicks 'Show all filters' link under the filters menu 'Setting' on the Search Results page
the modal form 'Show all filters' should be displayed on Search Results page
the tab "Setting" should be selected in the modal form 'Show all filters' on the Search Results page

substeps.message: Filter by name was  clicked and loaded

steps.title: the user clicks tab "Thematic Groups" in the modal form 'Show all filters' on the Search Results page
I check 1 filter on pop-up 'Show all filters' for filter group "Thematic Groups"
I click 'Apply' button in the modal form Show all filters on the Search Results page

substeps.message: Filter Results' aredisplayed with proper count.The filter count is 104529 and header count is 104529

steps.title: I check results are displayed with proper count
I perform Quick Search by "pfizer"
